SearchCarrierActAbbreviatedRecord.MainSQL: SELECT +Option1 CSTID , LOAD_REP_CSTID , ACTID , CONVERT(CHAR(23), ACTDTTM, 20) AS ACTDTTM , CSTSTAT , EQPTID , PROCID , LOTID , TRF_STAT_CODE , CST_LOAD_LOCATION_CODE , PORT_ID , RACK_ID , CSTIUSE , INSUSER , CONVERT(CHAR(23), INSDTTM, 20) AS INSDTTM , CONVERT(CHAR(23), UPDDTTM, 20) AS UPDDTTM FROM tb_sfc_cst_act_hist with(nolock) where 1=1 +Option2 +Option3 ORDER BY ACTDTTM DESC
